languages.text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас, Авель печально произносит:{/n} "Так много потерь".
{n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."
languages.original_text: {n}Искоса взглянув на вас, Авель печально произносит:{/n} "Так много потерь".

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So many losses."

languages.text: {n}アベルはあなたを横目で流し見ると、残念そうに言う。{/n}「多大な損害を生んだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベルはあなたを横目で流し見ると、残念そうに言う。{/n}「多大な損害を生んだ」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}亚伯瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“损失太大了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}亚伯瞥了你一眼，悲伤地说道。{/n}“损失太大了。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel vous jette un regard en coin avant d'ajouter tristement :{/n} « Tant de pertes. »
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel vous jette un regard en coin avant d'ajouter tristement :{/n} « Tant de pertes. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel te mira de soslayo y dice con remordimiento:{/n} «Hemos perdido tanto».
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel te mira de soslayo y dice con remordimiento:{/n} «Hemos perdido tanto».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel blickt dich von der Seite her an und sagt reumütig:{/n} "So viel Verlust."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel blickt dich von der Seite her an und sagt reumütig:{/n} "So viel Verlust."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Abel sana yan bir bakış atıp kederle konuşuyor.{/n} "Çok fazla kayıp."
languages.original_text: {n}Abel gives you a sideways glance and says ruefully,{/n} "So much loss."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abel sana yan bir bakış atıyor ve kederli bir şekilde konuşuyor:{/n} "Çok fazla kayıp."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
